mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review(profile_no, isbn, review_content, review_score) VALUES (#{profile_no}, #{isbn}, #{review_content}, #{review_score})
mapper.select: SELECT review_no, profile_no, isbn, review_content, review_date, review_score FROM review WHERE isbn=#{isbn} ORDER BY review_date
